0.2.1.name: wordpress/asr-verify-code
0.2.1.description:
Are you worried about the spam? AsrVerifyCode is easy and simple!Try it now!

AsrVerifyCode is an anti-spam for Wordpress comments.The plugin works when reviewers submit replys,and then check the Verify Code.If the code does not correct it cannot comment.

AsrVerifyCode can support safety login for you. When you login in, you must enter the verify code showing on the image.




讨厌垃圾评论？试试简单有效的AsrVerifyCode吧！

AsrVerifyCode是一个防垃圾评论的Wordpress插件。该插件在用户输入评论时需要输入随机验证码，提交后进行验证。如果验证码不正确则不能发表评论。

AsrVerifyCode也是一个安全登录的插件，当你需要登入时，你必须输入图片中的验证码，如果验证码不正确将不能登录。
